description.value: A weapon with a quantum storage fusion can be placed into rel-state, erasing it from existence; the weapon remains quantumly entangled with its wielder, and it can be retrieved at any time. Sending a weapon into rel-state or retrieving it is a swift action. When the weapon is in rel-state, it has Bulk 0, can’t be disarmed or otherwise removed from its wielder, and can’t be used. If the wielder of the weapon is killed or destroyed, the weapon emerges from rel-state automatically.
